trans-unit.source: Executes the islands on a dedicated worker thread.
trans-unit.target: 在专用辅助线程上执行数据岛。

trans-unit.source: The worker thread's physical callstack then maps to the interpreter's virtual callstack.
trans-unit.target: 然后辅助线程的物理调用堆栈映射到解释器的虚拟调用堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The thread calling the entry point.
Private entry point called from islands.
trans-unit.target: 从数据岛调用的专用入口点。

trans-unit.source: Must be public so that the islands can invoke it.
trans-unit.target: 必须是公共的，以便数据岛可以调用它。
在调试器辅助线程上调用。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread>。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that it was using.
trans-unit.target: 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用<xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread>这样垃圾回收器才能收回已使用的内存。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Debugging.DebuggerManager.IslandThread> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。
